tests.//: Array with different value types (3 elements: count=3, cont=0 → 0x0c)
tests.name: array_with_string_int_null

tests.//: Nested empty arrays (outer: 1 element → 0x04, inner: 0 elements → 0x00)
tests.name: array_nested_empty

tests.//: Array with nested object (array: 1 element → 0x04, object: 1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: array_with_object

tests.//: Object with integer value (1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: object_with_int

tests.//: Object with negative small int value (1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: object_with_neg_int

tests.//: Object with larger int value (requires int16) (1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: object_with_int16

tests.//: Object with int64 value (1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: object_with_int64

tests.//: Object with negative int64 value (1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: object_with_neg_int64

tests.//: Object with float16 value (1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: object_with_float16

tests.//: Object with float64 value (1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: object_with_float64

tests.//: Object with string value (1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: object_with_string

tests.//: Object with boolean false value (1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: object_with_false

tests.//: Object with null value (1 pair → 0x04)
tests.name: object_with_null

tests.//: Object with nested empty object value (outer: 1 pair → 0x04, inner: 0 pairs → 0x00)
tests.name: object_with_nested_object

tests.//: Object with nested empty array value (object: 1 pair → 0x04, array: 0 elements → 0x00)
tests.name: object_with_nested_array

tests.//: Array with multiple element types (3 elements → 0x0c)
tests.name: array_varied_elements

tests.//: Array with larger integers (3 elements → 0x0c)
tests.name: array_with_int16

tests.//: Complex nested structure (roundtrip since key order is unspecified)
tests.name: complex_nested_structure

tests.//: Round-trip tests
tests.name: roundtrip_nested_arrays

tests.//: === Object key edge cases ===
tests.name: object_empty_string_key

tests.//: Empty string key with complex value
tests.name: object_empty_string_key_array_value

tests.//: Long string key (16+ bytes uses long string encoding)
tests.name: object_long_string_key

tests.//: Very long key (32 bytes)
tests.name: object_very_long_string_key

tests.//: Unicode object key - Japanese
tests.name: object_unicode_key_japanese

tests.//: Unicode object key - Emoji
tests.name: object_unicode_key_emoji

tests.//: Unicode object key - Mixed
tests.name: object_unicode_key_mixed

tests.//: Multiple objects with various key types
tests.name: object_mixed_key_types

tests.//: Object key that looks like a number
tests.name: object_numeric_string_key

tests.//: Object key with spaces
tests.name: object_key_with_spaces

tests.//: Nested objects with unicode keys
tests.name: object_nested_unicode_keys

tests.//: === Empty container nesting tests ===
tests.//note: Various patterns of nested empty containers

tests.//: Array of empty arrays
tests.name: array_of_empty_arrays

tests.//: Array of empty objects
tests.name: array_of_empty_objects

tests.//: Object with empty array values
tests.name: object_with_empty_array_values

tests.//: Object with empty object values
tests.name: object_with_empty_object_values

tests.//: Deeply nested empty arrays
tests.name: deeply_nested_empty_arrays

tests.//: Deeply nested empty objects
tests.name: deeply_nested_empty_objects

tests.//: Mixed empty containers
tests.name: mixed_empty_containers

tests.//: Alternating empty arrays and objects
tests.name: alternating_empty_containers

tests.//: Empty array encode verification (0 elements → 0x00)
tests.name: encode_empty_array

tests.//: Empty object encode verification (0 pairs → 0x00)
tests.name: encode_empty_object

tests.//: Nested empty array encode verification (outer: 1 element → 0x04, inner: 0 elements → 0x00)
tests.name: encode_nested_empty_array

tests.//: Empty object in array encode verification (array: 1 element → 0x04, object: 0 pairs → 0x00)
tests.name: encode_empty_object_in_array

tests.//: === Multi-chunk container tests ===
tests.//note: Chunk format: (count * 4) + (continuation * 2). Continuation=1 means more chunks follow.

tests.//: Multi-chunk array: chunk1 has 2 elements (cont=1), chunk2 has 1 element (cont=0)
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=2, cont=1 → 0x0a. Chunk2: count=1, cont=0 → 0x04
tests.name: decode_multichunk_array_2_1

tests.//: Multi-chunk array: chunk1 has 1 element (cont=1), chunk2 has 2 elements (cont=0)
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=1, cont=1 → 0x06. Chunk2: count=2, cont=0 → 0x08
tests.name: decode_multichunk_array_1_2

tests.//: Multi-chunk array: three chunks of 1 element each
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=1, cont=1 → 0x06. Chunk2: count=1, cont=1 → 0x06. Chunk3: count=1, cont=0 → 0x04
tests.name: decode_multichunk_array_1_1_1

tests.//: Multi-chunk array ending with empty final chunk (count=0, cont=0)
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=2, cont=1 → 0x0a. Chunk2: count=0, cont=0 → 0x00
tests.name: decode_multichunk_array_trailing_empty

tests.//: Multi-chunk array: single element then empty final chunk
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=1, cont=1 → 0x06. Chunk2: count=0, cont=0 → 0x00
tests.name: decode_multichunk_array_1_then_empty

tests.//: Multi-chunk array with mixed value types
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=2, cont=1 → 0x0a (string, int). Chunk2: count=2, cont=0 → 0x08 (null, bool)
tests.name: decode_multichunk_array_mixed_types

tests.//: Multi-chunk object: chunk1 has 1 pair (cont=1), chunk2 has 1 pair (cont=0)
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=1, cont=1 → 0x06. Chunk2: count=1, cont=0 → 0x04
tests.name: decode_multichunk_object_1_1

tests.//: Multi-chunk object: chunk1 has 2 pairs (cont=1), chunk2 has 1 pair (cont=0)
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=2, cont=1 → 0x0a. Chunk2: count=1, cont=0 → 0x04
tests.name: decode_multichunk_object_2_1

tests.//: Multi-chunk object ending with empty final chunk (count=0, cont=0)
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=2, cont=1 → 0x0a. Chunk2: count=0, cont=0 → 0x00
tests.name: decode_multichunk_object_trailing_empty

tests.//: Multi-chunk object: single pair then empty final chunk
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=1, cont=1 → 0x06. Chunk2: count=0, cont=0 → 0x00
tests.name: decode_multichunk_object_1_then_empty

tests.//: Multi-chunk object with three chunks
tests.//note: Chunk1: count=1, cont=1 → 0x06. Chunk2: count=1, cont=1 → 0x06. Chunk3: count=1, cont=0 → 0x04
tests.name: decode_multichunk_object_1_1_1

tests.//: Multi-chunk nested: outer array in chunks, containing objects
tests.//note: Outer: chunk1 has 1 elem (cont=1) → 0x06, chunk2 has 1 elem (cont=0) → 0x04
tests.name: decode_multichunk_nested_array_of_objects

tests.//: Multi-chunk nested: outer object in chunks, containing arrays
tests.//note: Outer: chunk1 has 1 pair (cont=1) → 0x06, chunk2 has 1 pair (cont=0) → 0x04
tests.name: decode_multichunk_nested_object_of_arrays
